sections.heading: district; area withdrawn; not subject to assessments after withdrawal
sections.text: An area withdrawn from a district shall not be subject to assessment or otherwise chargeable for any obligation of any nature or kind incurred after the withdrawal of the area from the district.SourceLaws 1959, c. 83, ยง 15, p. 379

23-3543.Hospital district; area withdrawn; not subject to assessments after withdrawal.

An area withdrawn from a district shall not be subject to assessment or otherwise chargeable for any obligation of any nature or kind incurred after the withdrawal of the area from the district.

SourceLaws 1959, c. 83, ยง 15, p. 379;R.S.1943, (1987), ยง 23-343.34.
